title: Yes You Can do that in mgcv
text:
Preface
This is a book about the kinds of things you can do in mgcv that you might not have realised that you can do in mgcv.
Here are some possible topics:

Poisson process fitting
cross-validation
stochastic partial differential equation smoothing
capture-recapture (I think?)
being a secret Bayesian and being a more obvious Bayesian

with bonus material on:

how to not do things in mgcv (how to import mgcv smoothers into other models/frameworks/software)

title: 1  Introduction
text: Some info here about the target audience, background knowledge, etc?

title: 2  Summary
text: In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
